trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_SEQ_00<tab>The Nonmind drone is trying to catch your attention.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_SEQ_01<tab>The Nonmind drone wants to express her thanks to the Vath storyteller and the Vath who took her in. Help her by slaying hippocerfs and gathering three hippocerf skins.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_SEQ_02<tab>You slay and skin the hippocerfs. Deliver the hides to the Nonmind drone.

TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_SEQ_03<tab>The Nonmind drone gives the hides to the storyteller and fleetfoot to eat as a gift of thanks. Seeing them enthusiastically eating her gifts, she leaves on a journey to explore the realm.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_SEQ_04<tab>Within moments of the drone's departure, the storyteller admits that the taste of the hippocerf skin was near-unbearably disgusting.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_TODO_00<tab>Slay hippocerfs and obtain hippocerf skins.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the skins to the Nonmind drone.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Vath storyteller.

TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_STORYTELLER_000_000<tab>Our new sister is a diligent worker─a tireless contributor to the hive. She mentioned that she wants to talk to you. Please go to her and find out what she wanted to discuss.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_IDATEN_000_001<tab>Our new sister said she wants to speak with you.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_GOODGNATHA01804_000_010<tab>We are Nonmind now. We think clearly now! We have left the hive, but we want to go even further. We want to see the realm!
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_STORYTELLER_000_011<tab><click> <click> We of the Nonmind─we are independent. As independent creatures, it stands that we ought be free.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_IDATEN_000_012<tab>Loth ast Vath is not like Loth ast Gnath. You may leave at any time. It is no prison. The Vath all live free.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_GOODGNATHA01804_000_013<tab>We owe the Vath a great debt of gratitude. <click> <click> Hunter, could you help us? We need three hippocerf skins.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_GOODGNATHA01804_000_020<tab>Please kill hippocerfs, hunter. Kill them and gather their hides for us.

TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_STORYTELLER_000_021<tab>Our new sister is a diligent worker─a tireless contributor to the hive. She mentioned that she wants to talk to you. Please go to her and find out what she wanted to discuss.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_IDATEN_000_022<tab><click> <click> <click> <click> What an unusual food.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_GOODGNATHA01804_000_030<tab>Do you have the hippocerf skins, hunter?

TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_GOODGNATHA01804_000_031<tab>Thank you, kind hunter. <click> <click> Hippocerf skin is truly exquisite─especially raw. Storyteller, please eat this hippocerf skin. Eat it as it is. It is truly exquisite.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_STORYTELLER_000_041<tab><click> <click> Thank you. <munch> <munch> <munch> This is...truly...exquisite!
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_IDATEN_000_042<tab><click> <click> If you insist. <munch> <munch> <munch> Yes...it truly is...exquisite!
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_GOODGNATHA01804_000_043<tab><click> <click> We are glad you like it! Now we intend to go out and see the realm.
TEXT_HEAVNZ313_01805_STORYTELLER_000_044<tab><spit> <spit> <spit> <click> That was truly disgusting. What terrible, terrible taste... But such is individuality.
